Class SesameEnrichment

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer

          • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
            • com.ontotext.kim.gate.SesameEnrichment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.creole.ANNIEConstants, gate.Executable, gate.LanguageAnalyser, gate.ProcessingResource, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable

    @CreoleResource(name="Semantic Enrichment PR",
                comment="The Semantic Enrichment PR allows adding new data to semantic annotations by querying external RDF (Linked Data) repositories.",
                helpURL="http://nmwiki.ontotext.com/lkb_gazetteer/semantic_encrichment_pr.html")
public class SesameEnrichment
extends gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
    The Semantic Enrichment PR allows adding new data to semantic annotations by querying external RDF (Linked Data) repositories.

    Here a semantic annotation is an annotation that is linked to an RDF entity by having the URI of the entity in the "inst" feature of the annotation. For all such annotation of a given type, this PR runs a SPARQL query against the defined repository and puts a comma-separated list of the values mentioned in the query output in the "connections" feature of the same annotation.

    Author:
    mnozchev
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
